embed.description: Tower Defense : a community-created game where you have two choices; defend your nexus for as long as possible or siege their nexus by utilizing ZZ'Rot Portals and Banner of Command. -Intro Song : https://www.youtube.com/watch?v=32lHtrBMrvo -Outro Song : https://www.youtube.com/watch?v=4UJy7CcHgfQ
